/*
 * 0011	3
 * 0101	5
 * 0110	6
 * 1001	9
 * 1010	10
 * 1100	12
 * 
 * 2x2 grid has two 0s and two 1s in all binary combinations
 * 
 * 1x1		4					2
 * 2x2		16				6
 * 3x3		64				20
 * 4x4		256				70
 * 5x5		1024			252
 * 6x6		4096			924
 * 7x7		16384			3432
 * 8x8		65536			12870
 * 9x9		262144		48620
 * 10x10	1048576		184756
 * 11x11	4194304		705132
 * 12x12	16777216	2704156
 * 13x13	67108864	10400600
 * 14x14	268435456	40116600
 * 
 * 0000 0
 * 0001 1
 * 0010 1
 * 0011 2
 * 0100 1
 * 0101 2
 * 0110 2
 * 0111 3
 * 1000 1
 * 1001 2
 * 1010 2
 * 1011 3
 * 1100 2
 * 1101 3
 * 1110 3
 * 1111 4
 */
